forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High near 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this evening with a steady, soaking rain overnight. Increasing winds. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 12C. Winds SW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 54F. Winds SW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 44F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High near 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 51F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 46F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High near 10C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 51F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 46F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. High around 10C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with periods of rain. High around 50F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 5C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 42F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 9C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 48F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High near 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 7C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low around 45F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers, with increasing winds in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 51F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 45F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
